features.Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-13700H (up to 5.0 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 24 MB L3 cache, 14 cores, 20 threads)
features.Storage: 512 GB PCIe® Gen4 NVMe™ M.2 SSD 512 GB PCIe® Gen4 NVMe™ TLC M.2 SSD
features.Camera: HP True Vision 1080p FHD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones
features.Audio: Audio by B&O; Dual speakers; HP Audio Boost
features.USB Ports:
1 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate
1 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (HP Sleep and Charge)
1 USB Type-C® 5Gbps signaling rate (DisplayPort™ 1.4, HP Sleep and Charge)
